items.title: Claims that Binance helped with Trump Launch for CZ Pardon! Coinbase $1.9B in revenue!
items.summary: Crypto majors are down 1-3% after a major post-fomc dip yesterday; btc -3% at $110,100, eth -3% at $3,900, bnb +1% at $1,120, sol -2% at $192. Zec (+2%) and aero (+2%) led top movers. 870m+ was liquidated from the crypto market yesterday after bitcoin’s dip to $106,000 driving many alts down 5-10%+. Senator chris murphy has alleged that binance helped coordinate the trump memecoin launch in exchange for cz’s pardon (also featured on the wsj). Coinbase q3 beat revenue with ~$1.9b, transaction rev
